logentry.author: andreas

logentry.msg: Don't try to detect content dirs of empty areas

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: an alternative approach to bug 42295 (tab links making no sense going from "site->trash" etc. to "authoring". i think this fixes the root cause. please review, i'm not too familiar with menu2xhtml.xsl and may have broken some corner cases!

logentry.msg: RepositorySource: Apply revision parameter only if the source matches the source of the main document of the current request. This fixes bug 42394.

logentry.msg: Use parameters to resolve source instead of page envelope (xhtml module sitemap)

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Bug 42407 - allowing admin.siteOverview to order desc/asc. I thought we had been in code freeze that is why I did not not committed the patch in the first place.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: add workaround for firefox: check if page is empty, if so, add  . this prevents the textarea element from collapsing, which firefox still can't handle after all those long long years...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed profiling statement from menu generation pipeline. looks like an accidental commit to me...

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added option for relative URLs to UuidToUrlTransformer

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] removed invalid javadoc tag

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: documentation update. added explicit warning about performance penalty.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: updated XHTML doctype samples (wrong hints for 1.4 menu layout)

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: copied usecase handler code from oneform editor to fix rollback failure when a validation error is encountered. FIXME: this code should be moved into DocumentUsecase and shared by all editors, rather than duplicated in every module. documentation updates.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed unused scripts from webapp directory and from build targets. they now live under tools/misc/ for a short grace period. if nobody bothers to test them and add some comments so as to make them useful for the general public within two weeks, they will be removed.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed obsolete "rendertype=edit" parameter from tinymce menu link. (tinymce delegates the rendering to the publication and does its own post-processing afterwards, hence the publication need not be concerned with a special "edit" rendering)

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: fix missing scrollbars in insertAsset usecase popup. improve insertAsset table layout to make it more robust for very large image sizes. get rid of "compiled" js, use pretty-printed one by default. the missing scrollbars were caused by the two files being out of sync. if we want to preserve bandwidth, we should get rid of js whitespace on-the-fly, not use unmaintainable source files in svn.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
trivial refactoring of default pub sitemap.xmap. the doctype-specific xslt is now generated in a separate pipeline. this avoids some local code duplication and improves readability.
one functional change: the fallback stylesheet if no doctype-specific one is found is now page2xhtml.xsl (used to be page2xhtml-xhtml.xsl).

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Changing the login as editor caption since one can as well login as reviewer, admin, ...

logentry.msg: Added more info about resource type formats

logentry.msg: [minor change] fixed sitemap comments

logentry.msg: So that webDAV will run the clean. FCKeditor also looks for this property. Taken from src/modules/xhtml/config/cocoon-xconf/resource-type-xhtml.xconf.

logentry.author: rfrovarp
logentry.msg: Don't transform uuids to urls when editing. Will prevent problems if resources change url while editing is occurring. This is the behavior of BXE and FCKeditor.
